conclusion: Analyze the direction of the liquid flow based on the orientation of the baffles.
Baffle A: The liquid flows horizontally from left to right.
Baffle B: The liquid flows vertically downward.
Baffle C: The liquid flows horizontally from right to left.
After Baffle A: The liquid will continue flowing horizontally from left to right.
After Baffle B: The liquid will continue flowing vertically downward.
After Baffle C: The liquid will continue flowing horizontally from right to left.
Container D: Positioned below the horizontal flow paths created by baffles A and C.
Since the liquid will flow horizontally from left to right and then vertically downward, it will enter Container D.
Container E: Positioned to the right of the horizontal flow path created by baffle C.
Since the liquid will flow horizontally from right to left, it will not reach Container E.
The liquid will flow into Container D after passing through baffles A, B, and C.
Final Answer: The liquid will flow into Container D.
